# NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection

**Enumeration**

Specifies the directional flow of the user interface.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection
```

## Overview

These constants are returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/userInterfaceLayoutDirection].

## Constants

- **NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection.leftToRight**: Layout direction is left to right.
- **NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection.rightToLeft**: Layout direction is right to left.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## User interface layout direction

- **userInterfaceLayoutDirection**: The layout direction of the user interface.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
